## ‚úÖ All Issues Now Have:

- ‚úÖ **Descriptive titles** - Clear what the program does
- ‚úÖ **Difficulty level** - [EASY], [INTERMEDIATE], [ADVANCED], [EXPERT]
- ‚úÖ **Proper descriptions** - What to build, skills practiced
- ‚úÖ **Acceptance criteria** - Checklist for completion
- ‚úÖ **File locations** - Where to create the file
- ‚úÖ **Proper labels** - For filtering and searching

---

## üéØ Issue Title Format

All issues now follow this format:

```
[DIFICULTY] #Number Program Name - Description
```

Examples:
- `[EASY] #012 Calculate Rectangle Area`
- `[INTERMEDIATE] Build Contact Book with Search`
- `[ADVANCED] Implement JWT Authentication System`
- `[EXPERT] Build Neural Network from Scratch`

---

## üîç How to Browse Issues

### By Difficulty
- **Easy:** https://github.com/hackdartstorm/Python/issues?q=is%3Aopen+label%3Abeginner
- **Intermediate:** https://github.com/hackdartstorm/Python/issues?q=is%3Aopen+label%3Aintermediate
- **Advanced:** https://github.com/hackdartstorm/Python/issues?q=is%3Aopen+label%3Aadvanced
- **Expert:** https://github.com/hackdartstorm/Python/issues?q=is%3Aopen+label%3Aexpert-level

### By Label
- **Good First Issue:** https://github.com/hackdartstorm/Python/issues?q=is%3Aopen+label%3A%22good+first+issue%22
- **Feature:** https://github.com/hackdartstorm/Python/issues?q=is%3Aopen+label%3Afeature
- **Bug:** https://github.com/hackdartstorm/Python/issues?q=is%3Aopen+label%3Abug
